about_the_game:
Action-packed, sci-fi platformer where you play as Nova, a cyborg with extraordinary technological abilities. Immerse yourself in an exciting journey with beautiful retro-styled graphics, pristine polygons, and a nostalgic spacesynth soundtrack blending modern gameplay, graphics, music, and effects seamlessly together.

Explore the world


Become Nova, a courageous cyborg and a member of the "Field Hunters" on a resource-gathering mission for the depleted home planet, Ultragon. A normal everyday mission becomes a battle for survival when you crash-land on a Death Zone planet. Equipped with your blaster rifle, your wits, and unyielding determination, you gain new abilities and uncover well-hidden secrets as you fight your way through enemies and rough conditions searching for a way back home.

Master your skills

Key Features:

  • Engage in Gripping Narrative: Immerse yourself in an enthralling story. Unveil the mysteries of the Death Zone planet through quirky locals you encounter on your way.
  • Explore a Dying World: Traverse the harsh landscapes of a planet in its death throes. Survive the extreme weather conditions, from desolate deserts to swamp-like forests and frozen mountains.
  • Fight to survive: Engage in intense battles learning the different abilities of your enemies and how to beat them.
  • Unleash Cyborg Abilities: Acquire powerful gear and augmentations throughout your journey. Collect tabs or complete side quests to enhance your abilities and gain new combat prowesses to overcome increasingly difficult challenges and enemies.
  • Climb on the Leaderboard: Compete against other players with intense one-player vs. the game system challenges. Earn achievements and rise to the top of the global leaderboards to showcase your talent.
